content:
As an AI language model, I cannot know for certain what Elizabeth I would have preferred in her personal life. However, it is worth noting that Elizabeth was a very private person who famously did not like to reveal much about her innermost thoughts and feelings. Although she sometimes expressed loneliness and regret at never having a husband or children, she also had a strong sense of duty and devotion to her role as queen. 

It is possible that a more "normal" life outside of court politics could have brought Elizabeth a kind of happiness she never experienced as queen, but it is also possible that the challenges and stress of royal life were uniquely suited to her personality and character. In the end, it is impossible to say what might have brought Elizabeth the most fulfillment, and it is likely that she found her own way to be content and satisfied in her life as queen.
